name: Pure Essential Oils
description:
Each wonderful essential oils can be used as a small, portanle perfume, in your home or car, or for simple personal pleasure. 

Some of these oils are quite precious, others are commonly found, but all are of high quality, complex, and unadulterated. 

Many are organic.

Each oil will be sold in 15ml sealed  amber glass containers, diluted in jojoba oil.

Some of the botanicals I have to offer are:

Cardamom
Neroli
Rose (Chinese)
Jasmine
White Champa
Myrrh
Rose Geranium
Lavender.

I have many wonderful citruses, like:

Pink grapefruit
Yuzu (Japanese grapefruit)
Lemon
Blood Orange
Clementine
Mandarin (red), etc.

And for the foodies, I have spices:

Bay 
Fennel
Tarragon
Anise

name: Botanical Perfume - Limited Edition Only
description:
ï¿¼
Pomegranate, Lotus & Plum offers a line of 'delicious, nutritious' natural perfume, hand-crafted from plant materials and organic alcohol, and free of synthetic fragrances and chemical additives. 

Pomegranate, Lotus & Plum's scents are designed to be less like an outer layering of scent that one adds on top of clothes as a kind of armor, and more like lingerie, an intimate item that becomes a subtle enhancement to the wearer's confident awareness of a sensual self, something that enriches the experience of the wearer from *within*. 

Our fragrances do not intrude upon others but wrap the wearer in an experience that draws others closer.

Our current line consists of:

Perfume #1: White florals, Citrus and Myrrh
Perfume #2: Chocolate, Bay, and Lime
Perfume #3: Rose, Violet, and Clementine Orange
Perfume #4: Jasmine, Neroli, and Yuzu (Japanese Grapefruit)
Solid perfume
Perfume Oil
